extendedInfo.description: With Ring Manager Pro you can get ring for selected numbers even though the phone is in silent mode so that you won't miss important calls probably in the night.In the OFF state ringer mode is normal.In the ON state it will be in silent mode except for those selected numbers.

reviews.comment: Its about time someone made something to trump that horrible night ringer. Edit: made phone vibrate sometimes when it was supposed to ring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have had this widget since I owned the first droid (now on Sprint w/evo). Works flawlessly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Call blocking/allowing not working on Galaxy S Froyo. 15 minute refund limit means no time to talk to dev to solve app problems - sorry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app since my original Motorola Droid and I you it every day.
reviews.author: Derek Kreft

reviews.comment: Great program. Would be better if it also worked with texts. Does anybody know a program that does?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Worked great on Droid1. Now won\'t work at all on Droid3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This totally screwed with my phone. Sometimes it would just come off silent randomly. Not great if there are times you cannot have your phone Ringing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Initial dl on my orig moto droid was great, good app. Wouldnt re-dl to my replacement droid, just says \"loading\", no reply from developer :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It worked great for a day then caused some ringing issues that stopped my phone from ringing, I uninstalled and reinstalled but it still won\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had it for a month now on my X. WORKS FLAWLESS! What a lifesaver!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motorola droid
reviews.comment: Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This does not work for froyo! Dev does not respond!!! Whoisit is better app by better developer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Downloaded but will not open or run. So far, no.response from developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: if it doesn\'t work the first time you download it yet uninstall it and reinstall it to go to widget a will pop up. It worked for me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but....
reviews.comment: Works great.  Moto Droid, Fascinate, 4G, 3D, S2. My #1 app.   Would like to see cleaner icon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Purchased, downloaded.....and it can\'t be opened!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great droidX, months of use now, would give 5 stars if it worked for both texts and calls. Add texts and this app is perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Did a factory reset, then reinstalled, now when adding back onto home screen, it just says \"loading.\" Used to work so well, too. A shame. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Stopped working on my droid 1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Paid for it, downloaded it but the icon doesnt appear. .... not good
